attributes.action: Keep the 5 year ILR route as committed to SW visa holders including Healthcare
attributes.additional_details: Its like employment contract mentions 3 months probation leading to full time employment but nearing the completion the employers tells you it will always be a temporary employment contract. Same goes for this change if applied retrospectively, before we made travel arrangements to the UK we were assured a 5 year route & now it says 10-15 years which is unfair by all means.
attributes.background: When the entry clearance was issued it committed a 5 year route to settlement and now govt wishes to extend it to 15 years

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for similar action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751293
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745684
